actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to allow credit under the civil service retirement program for military service performed by a citizen of the United States in the armed forces of any nation allied or associated with the United States during a period of War.

summary.text: Permits credit under the civil service retirement program for military service performed by a citizen of the United States in the armed forces of any nation allied or associated with the United States during a period of war.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to allow credit under the civil service retirement program for military service performed by a citizen of the United States in the armed forces of any nation allied or associated with the United States during a period of War.
